title: Client crashed
body: so my client crashed and gives me a leave buster why? while in champion select

replies.body:
If this happened in champ select, you're most likely seeing a Queue Dodge low-priority queue rather than a Leaverbuster penalty. If you work down the timer and play through a match without going AFK, you should be good to go.

If you continue to experience these crashes or have any questions, let me know.
